titleStmt.title: A declaration of Captaine John Musgrave prisoner in Newgate. Vindicating him against the misprisians and imputed reasons of his sad imprisonment for high treason against the state. With an order, or proclamation : by the Committee of the City of London, with the Committee of Lords and Commons for safety; for listing in the late ingagement, &c.
titleStmt.author: Musgrave, John, fl. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Cotes] for John Musgrave, and are to bee sold in Newgate-market,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
